title: [1.8][The Additional Blocks Mod]更多建筑方块形状--装饰神器
author: vv1160053354
txt_content:
本帖最后由 U1U420039 于 2016-8-15 16:18 编辑 


更多建筑方块形状！
你还在感叹mojang加入的方块形状很少？
你还在想为什么只有石砖、錾制石砖？
这个mod解决了！
作者原话
This mod adds the ability to craft many different types of brick blocks with many different types of building blocks. You can now make bricks out of snow, smooth sandstone, red smooth sandstone, diorite, quartz, granite, andesite, stone and regular bricks. This mod allows for a much broader spectrum of brick patterns that give you more options for your designs. Minecraft does alright with its vanilla brick patterns but this mod truly allows for maximum customization with your brick layouts. Get creative by mixing and matching brick types with similar designs. Link Download In My Blogger:http://minecraftlitess.blogspot. ... nal-blocks-mod.html Thank you for visit

简介
这个mod增加了12种形状的雪、沙石、红沙石、石英、闪长岩、花岗岩、安山岩、石头和普通砖，让你的建筑画龙点睛！

方块

这个mod增加了12种形状的雪、沙石、红沙石、石英、闪长岩、花岗岩、安山岩、石头和普通砖
一共108个方块，形状如下图↓


合成
合成的方式都是一样的，只是方块不一样
